text: Kerry Joyce is an interior designer, designer of houses and product designer. He directs the firm Kerry Joyce Associates, which is located in Los Angeles California. In addition to his line of furniture, lighting, rug and textile designs, Joyce's firm has worked on a wide variety of residential interior design projects. Joyce was born in Boston, Massachusetts. He attended North Carolina School of the Arts in Winston-Salem and earned a bachelor's degree in scenery and lighting design for the theatre from New York University School of the Arts. His first monograph, Kerry Joyce - The Intangible was published by Pointed Leaf Press in 2018.
